Instance.description: A situation goal that allows you to specify test events that you can listen to and an associated score to award when a specific event is successfully run.

TunableList.name: test_events_to_score
TunableList.description: A mapping of test event -> score achieved when successfully ran.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The event to listen to for goal completion.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tuple of the score to award and other checks to make on the event before it satisfies the goal.

TunableVariant.name: interaction
TunableVariant.description: When turned on there will be a test to verify that the interaction sending the associated test event is the same as the tuned interaction.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The interaction to require the event to come from in order for it to satisfy the goal.

Tunable.name: score
Tunable.description: The score the goal results in when completed.

TunableEnum.name: status
TunableEnum.description: The status of the goal result. This will only change the visual when removing this goal from the list of goals.
